name: Cubicus 2
description:
Continuation of the first part of the puzzle in which you will find even more levels of varying difficulty.

Cubicus 2 has tons of challenging and challenging levels, so complete them all!
You have to go from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can go this way is up to you.

Features of the game:
- Many levels
- Convenient management
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
